title: Ouch: Man's Scrotum Swells Bigger Than Football, Starts Rotting & Hangs Down His Knees
text:
Some diseases are a pain in the ass and some…in the scrotum. A man’s life was becoming a living hell as his scrotum got swollen bigger than a football, started rotting and hung below his knees, according to his doctors.

The 43-year-old man showed up in A&E, with two open wounds in his scrotum which were expelling a foul-smelling pus.

The man was diagnosed with Fournier's gangrene which is a flesh-eating disease that can be fatal. The man was incapable of walking because his genitals were so large and heavy and almost sagged down to the ground.

Graphic content ahead

Science Direct

The ‘doctors believed he had a parasitic disease caused by an infection with blood-feeding roundworms’, according to Daily Mail. Reportedly, the man had been using a walker to get around and his daily needs were taken care of by his mother, as he could not perform a lot of tasks because of the swelling.

The doctors in Central American country of Panama were stunned (who wouldn’t be?), looking at the man’s swollen scrotum when he turned up at a hospital. The man had to undergo a number of operations and surgeries for a number of problems.

A part of the report of the case reads, ‘On examination, there was massive scrotal edema (swelling) with displacement past the level of his knees.The scrotal skin was thickened and there were two open wounds with foul smelling, purulent fluid located at the bottom of the left hemi-scrotum’.

Science Direct

The doctors had to take care of a number of things including the rotting flesh. However, they successfully managed to do so. After a number of successful surgeries and operations, the man is reportedly in a rehabilitation facility now. Ten days after the surgery the doctors said he "was healing well with satisfactory cosmetic and functional outcomes".

Here is hoping that the man gets well soon.
